name: DEPECHE MODE
description: Violator is the seventh studio album by English electronic music band Depeche Mode. It was first released on 19 March 1990 through Mute Records

name: The Roling Stones
description: Sticky Fingers is the 9th British and 11th American studio album. TReleased it on 23 April 1971 on their new, and own label Rolling Stones Records.
imageAlt: The Roling Stones - Sticky Fingers album

name: Michael Jackson
description: Bad is the seventh studio album by American singer  Michael Jackson. It was released on August 31, 1987, by Epic Records.

name: Metallica
description: Master of Puppets is the third studio album by the American heavy metal band Metallica, released on March 3, 1986, by Elektra Records.
